entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lacombe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lacombe AAFC 2:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 3.

entry.title: Sunday night: Fog. Low minus 5.
